Package com.dcprograming.game.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dcprograming.game.entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class handles all the first person player operations, such as movement and mouse based rotation
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    50018003

        Constructor for player initialization
        Parameters:
        x - - X position
        y - - Y position
        z - - Z position
        fov - - Field of View
        ilx - - Initial look X position
        ily - - Initial look Y position
        ilz - - Initial look Z position
